content.detailedDescription: My daughter and myself were driving home from mcdonalds on strawberry plains pike. we seen a very bright light in the sky, it was hovering. i gave my daughter my phone to record a video.
content.summary: Flashing lights/ unknown object

content.detailedDescription: I was looking outside my window when there was a small red dot for two days, it usually was in one black, it flashed with a orangish/redish colors that were hard to make out, suddenly the second day it had a giant circle over it with the red dot in the middle, it was only for 10-20 seconds then red rectangles came out of the top area and vanished, i went to my living room where all the lights and most electronic devices blew out(lights permanently electronics disabled for a while) i grabbed my flashlight and went to check it was a to the right a large amount, after that i started seeing odd shadows for only a few seconds. when i went up the grass was crushed all the way up. i could not go the full distance as that is private property and a river separates us. my family and friends all saw this they were puzzled as well many rushed home. there were strange blue, purple, and red smoke or some sort of waves and pulses like clouds that you would see in some sort of movie, they almost looked like smooth metal to ice.
content.summary: Small circle then giant circle, red boxes

content.detailedDescription: I was at back to school night.When i heard a whoosh sound and saw light.Because i started to get intersted in aliens.It just flew.I was happy surprised and confused.When it went too far behind the horizon of the treetop.
content.summary: The ufo was a triangle with a red orange and white light.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking and looked at the stars like i always do.  i noticed one above the horizon that was oscillating very strangely (not like the other bright stars).  when i decided to keep my eyes on it that's when it started to move around.  at first i just assumed it was an airplane since they normally fly in or out of that direction, but it wasn't coming closer or moving in the typical fashion i normally see the airplanes fly.  a little in disbelief, i leaned against a wall just to make sure it wasn't my eyes playing tricks on me, and i even used the top part of my fence as a gauge to see how far it moved to and from the top of the fence.  sure enough it was going in circles, figure 8's, up and down, and never moved back to the exact spot i first noticed it was in, yet never left the area it was flying around in.  this is actually the third such "star" i've seen doing this within the last 30 days.  though these are not the first ufo sightings in my lifetime, there was no negative feelings toward the object, but more of a childlike excitement and sense of relief at confirming some of my ponderings as to whether or not some of the stars in the sky are not really stars.  i found it strange that i'm actually getting an answer.  i never lost sight of the object, my daughter actually woke up and i had to put her back to bed.  i looked out of the window 10 minutes later and it was still there, then it started moving around again.  overall, i believe approximately 30 minutes had elapsed.
content.summary: Star-like object upon appearance, but after observing it started to move around.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Last night at 1:32 am 3 friends and i were out on a walk. at one point when we were looking at the sky, two of the others and i saw two lights fairly low (about 500 feet, it's hard to tell) move very slowly heading northwest (more north leaning) and then speed off at an extremely fast rate until it disappeared. the whole thing lasted about 5 seconds, and 3 of us all saw the same thing.
content.summary: Two lights appeared about 500-1000 feet in the air, and then both flew away in about 5 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Whole story has a lot of "cute" details. it would take a half an hour to write.
content.summary: Wilderness at night. middle creek. saturn shaped. self lit like tube light. eight feet wide. made me very upset then it turned into front porch swing and i calmed down greatly...Crazy event!

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling into my drive way, i had never seen anything like it before and have been around aircraft all my life.When i first noticed it i thought it was a star but then i quckly noticed it was moving very fast moving from northeast toward the west it then stoped dead and hovered for about 5 min. it was kind of domed shaped on top but flat on the bottom there was no soun and the color it seemed to be glowing it was bluish green very bright in color. after the sighting sighting i almost couldnt believe what i had seen, told my family what i had seen right after the sighting i was vey excited. it went back toward the north east very fast it was out of my sight within a half of a second if i would have blinked i would have missed its leaving
content.summary: I watched a bright grenish blue object flying fron the northeast moving west i then witnessed it hovering maybe a mile and a half from me after watching it for about 5 min it left the area backnortheast if i would have blinked i would have missed it.

content.detailedDescription: Saw object above my house hovering, then headed north. took picture.
content.summary: Left house got in car, saw object, took picture.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking past my window in my kitchen when i noticed something big hovering over the trees in my back woods. i stopped and went over to the window and watched it. i was really scared, so i called my neighbor who lived on the other side of these woods.I asked my neighbor to please look out her back window and look over towards my house and tell me what she saw.  when she came back to the phone she said" if i didn't know better, i would think i was looking at a flying saucer." i never told her what i thought it was before i asked her to look out the window. i thanked her and told her, that i was just confirming what i was seeing hovering over our woods.
i got this feeling like something was coming for me outside my house. after the phone call there is a total no recall of anything. i don't know if i saw or imagined a line of small gray people outside of my house coming for me. i awoke on my living room couch and a different neighbor down the street was knocking on my back door.  i was so happy to see him and immediately said "k-- there is a flying saucer outside hovering over the woods. k---went to the window and said " there's nothing out there. k---sat down and i went over to the window and looked out there. it wasn't hovering over the trees anymore. i looked higher up and more easterly and there it was. it was lower than any of the stars and very bright. it moved to the right and then to the left. it kept making this m in the sky. 
i was already embarassed at the fact i just blurted out there was a flying saucer, so i didn't point out the fact it was out there making an m in the sky. i was still looking out the window when my husband came home (8:30-9 pm). my neighbor blurted out to my husband as he was coming in the door, that it was a good thing he just got home because (me) was seeing flying saucers. my husband stopped in his tracks and said let me tell you what i just saw. on his way home( on a back road)he stopped to relieve himself. he said he looked up in the sky and there was this bright thing making a continuous m in the sky. now, i hadn't told my neighbor or even spoke one word to my husband yet. so, he saw it also.
i have been afraid to mention this to anyone, this was in 1977.
content.summary: Saw the ufo hovering over the trees in my back woods.

content.detailedDescription:
The story of my girlfriends experiences that never made reports and never wanted to tell anyone for the fact people would think she is crazy.

her experience would go back to when she was a little girl in fresno. she would wake up in the middle of the night seeing a bright light shining threw her window, like a florescence white and bright. different nights she was getting visits. in her living room she said they had some big size windows and that was the windows were she saw the aliens commonly known as the grays. they would stare at her for long periods of times and she felt like they were talking to her threw her mind. she would tell me in detail how these things looked, from the broad shoulders to how skinny they were. she would see the short ones that gave her an easy feeling that it wasn't there to hurt her but the taller ones she said were the ones that scared her and those ones she got more of a meaner vibes. theses vibes that she got were there ways of communicating.
 fast forward time she is in her early 20s year is 2006 in a town called sanger outside of fresno. she has three people in her car. a guy, girl and the girls daughter the road is dark no street lights. a craft pools up to them less than 100 feet above them. all four witnesses are freaking out for the fact they are alone in the dark road. i asked her if there was a chance it was a plane or helicopter. she said no way it was much bigger making no sound with less than 100 feet above them with lights on the craft. her friends told her to step on it and she did and this object was above her the hole time. the little girl was crying the guy was praying. from what she told me they all in the car were historical. finally the craft disappeared.

i always told her that i feel like they are following her..

we live in south san francisco now and my mother lives with us. about a year and a half ago one evening when me and my girlfriend were not home but my mom and my nephew were home. we have a big yard with a lot of trees, almost makes you feel like you are in a forest when you get to the back part of the yard. the forest type part of the yard is covered by a fence. my mom said that she noticed that my dog had its attention in the "forest" that is name we call that part of the yard. so the dog was watching something and my mom said how she noticed the dogs head moving fast from one side to the other almost like when you have a laser pointer and your dog moves its head fast to keep up with it. so she told her grandson to come with her to the "forest" to see why the dog is acting that way. when she gets there my mom and my nephew see these creature's in the forest running around in a very fast speed. they were around three feet tall and it was hard for her to make out how they looked because they were moving around at a very fast speed. she did say she saw green on them that could have been there clothing. my mom and nephew were very scared when they say these creatures. when ever i bring up this story they cant really remember what happened afterwards. i to my knowledge i never heard of aliens three feet tall running around at a speed faster then human. i hope someone can tell me if there ever has been another sighting of aliens of that kind.

i am 100% that my girlfriend, mom and nephew is not making there story's up. my girlfriend would take these story's to her grave if it wasn't for me. i want this to be reported because it gives me conformation that aliens are out there and so are these crafts and i want the people to know too
content.summary: Hovering, followed the car then flew away at a fast speed

content.detailedDescription: It started down the shore in tuckerton nj. the yard is rocks and around 4:30,am a alien was walking towards the window i was sleeping near, it called my name and then i had temporary paralisis. then i could move after a minute, i went to look and it jumped on the roof, the alien ran across the roof like a squirell on steriods. i felt like it left, so i went outside over the bay i saw a flash of light with a disc in the middle then it vanished. then a sesna plane flew to where the light was and then turned around this was at 4:30am april 2005. the next week it happened again this time i got a good look at the being it was approx 2 feet tall with a black space suit on and a star constellation on its chest. then i was spooked to go back down then shore.  then they started coming to my home, coming up to my window at 4:30 am calling my name, telling me to go outside. this went on for many years. wellaround june 2005, beings came thru my wall and were calling my name. i realized after a while they didnt understand english, so i taught them the alphabet, how to form words and meanings. these beings have the technology to be invisible and to pass thru walls. see i am disabled and no doctor could fix me, they said i would be in bed the rest of my life. these beings probed me, took samples and worked on me for many years. after 2 years of them working on me i miraculously got out of bed this was in 2007. i am no longer bed ridden all the time. now the aliens worked on my eye with some type of technology they said it will let them see what i see and help me see them better. sure enough i started to see them better. they also put something in my left ear to hear them better. these beings are telepathic. i experince telepathy, remote viewing, and psychic abilities since they ave been around.Then one day they asked me if i wanted to go on a space ride, i said sure. around 2007 they pulled me thru the wall and carried me to a ship, i remeber being pulled thru the wall and being carried thru trees, i remeber my feet brushing the trees. then i found myself floating in the middle of the ship with a big window in front of me, and two white greys at the controls, they said look at our planet, i did and i saw 4 spirrals and a planet with elongated continents.    i asked them what the spirral things were they said directional travel onto their planet, like n s e and west. then i excellerated backwards at a unknown speed the planet vanished and i had a buzzing sensation all thru my body, and i appeared in bed. i heard a racket i asked them what the noise was and the aliens said it was their engine. i felt hands on my body in bed probes going thru my legs,back brain, basically all over my body.One time the alien was touching me in bed and i felt its heart beat thru its hands, and its heart beat was 2-3 times faster than my own. now the beings are my friends they go where i go , they always talk to me , everyday , all day long,they are still with me still to this day,they wanna communicate to the right people. my friend recorded their voices on a evp recorder. i think i am running out of room so i will end this story for now, hopefully mufon will document the full story and the ships,beings and things and memories i have encountered since 2005.
content.summary: Many sitings and many ships, some cigar, triangle,disc shaped

content.detailedDescription:
That night my husband and i were sleeping when i started to get excessively warm. i went to kick off my blankets but found that i couldn't move my legs. i tired to move my arms and had no luck. i was only able to move my head enough to see an entity standing at the foot of the bed. i turned my head and noticed two more standing along the side of the bed behind my husband and he had an obviously disturbed look on his face almost as if he could tell they were there. our pom-chi dog was whining in her carrier where she sleeps, she's normally really quiet and doesn't wake us that often unless it is something serious. the entities stood there for what felt like half an hour before the slowly started to vanish.
i did not really see much of the object that they could have come in on because it was outside. it was kind of a triangle shape when it took off and had been hovering about 100-200 feet off the ground. our cell phones didn't work right for the entire day following and we've had electronic problems since the incident. the object moved south before going over the mountains.
my husband has no memory of anything that night or the morning after it happened but still remembers waking up with a paranoid feeling.
content.summary: Possible landing with entities in bedroom

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were in the woods at one of my favorite fishing holes having a bbq.  when we were cleaning up after the bbq i told my daughter to look up at the beautiful blue sky.  as i said that looking west i notice an object flying over the tree tops toward us.  there were 5 of us and our dog that witness this event.  the object had a shape to it, but was see true.  it seem to have a white glow to it , but you could see true it.  my girlfriend asked is that a plane when the object was directly over head, and as she ask that question the object while continuing its direction of travel turnt 180 and continued eastward without a sound till we couldn't see it anymore because of the trees on the other side if the river. it was 20 degrees celcius .  not a cloud in the sky.  i've been a amateur astronomer for many years, and never seen something unexplained before.  i really don't know what this object is.
content.summary: perfect blue sky. having a bbq with the family when object flu over ours heads and then while flying in a straight line did a 180.  object was see true.

content.detailedDescription: I work at the chino copper mine in bayard nm. we work half the month night shifts, and in my 10 years there i have never seen anything like this. at 7:30-7:40 pm on 4-7-14 me and my supervisor were in the pit and noticed a bright star-like object appear to the north. it was moving at a rate of speed that is not humanly possible. it traveled almost directly from north to south and covered the whole sky from the north horizon to south horizon in about 7 seconds. it was about the height that jets and commercial planes fly. the object was super bright like a star but a clear bright color. it was about twice the brightness of mars, and mars is bright right now. i got out of my pickup to listen as it passed over us and it made no sound. it had no tail like an asteroid, and the bright light did not blink, it had no blinking lights anywhere. it was right before dark, it was still dusk, but stars were visible.  we also worked night shift last night. i was working in the office when i heard over the radio one of the employees call his supervisor to see if he was seeing what he was. i talked to him about an hour after work and he said just east of the mine, around an area known as the kneeling nun, there were 3 star-like objects that were hovering, and circled each other then merged and shot off. i did not get the elevation, length of time or trajectory from him though.  he did not know of the sighting we had on the 7th, and when i asked him what it looked like, he described the same light that we saw on the previous night. he witnessed it around 5:45 am around dawn. i do not know if there is a pattern of dusk and dawn, but these lights are really scaring me a little. either the government has developed technology way ahead of their time, or we really are not alone. i would love for there to be an investigation and will cooperate in any way i can with any details needed. i will also have my camera ready in case it happens again.
content.summary: Bright starlike object went from north horizon to south horizon in 7 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading down a road in a new development beside the bay where a french school is, my neighbors from down the road were driving pretty slow when i came from around a turn where i slowed behind them and seen their two kids pointing and "dad" slowing down and pulling over so i finally seen what was taking their attention and i pulled in behind them. "it" was "still" in mid-air and never made so much as a click!   {{{silent}}}    ....After observing it with 4 witness's ...Down the street neighbor's ....Well we watched it for about 10 minutes and the neighbors had to leave ...It was about 1000 ft away i suppose and it was about 1000 ft high at best! ....It was larger then a passenger jet and was totally quiet. 
after my neighbors left i decided to move my car up closer to the bay so i could see it better  ...Basically just a different angle because i could see it fine!    ...It was long and thin ...The first light i noticed was the extremely bright white light shing below the craft, it was in the center and bright and round!   ...There were no other visible lights on the bottom of the craft  ....I know this because after observing the craft for about several minutes more after the witness's left.   
i was propped up against the back of my car and it started to move.
it seem to know i was watching it or something because it made a b-line right for me, i had the car turned off at the time ...It was dark!   ..
...So it moved slowly toward me, i wasn't as scared as i was in awe of it and when it reached me "over my head it turned to the ne and at the same smoothness and speed which was slow 15-22kph silently went on its way.
very important notice!   ....It had two flashing blue lights and two flashing red lights on the top of the craft  ....Besides the very bright white light on the bottom of the craft that "dimmed" a lot before it's decent toward me ....Those are the only light's i seen ...The 2 blue & red on top were flashing and the red were flashing twice as fast as the blue!
"i did call the airport authorities after talking with the rcmp" 
when i got home 5 minutes after!   ...No planes or chop's in over an hour and none expected for over an hour ...I was talking to the only guy in the control tower.
anyway now i know we have nothing like that!   ...So i'm a believer! 
the airport authority did tell someone right away about it because half a dozen airplanes were circling the site after several minutes of phoning them!  ....But i watched the thing for say near 20 minutes at least 15 and i never had a camera ....As far as i know or have heard me & my neighbors are the only witness's so ...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Close, quiet, huge, clear, blinking blue & red lights ...With white "very bright" light on bottom of craft lighting up bay!

content.detailedDescription: Saw this blue orb looking thing just appears then starts falling then gone but it was the size of my fist and it was about 1mile away maybe closer so kind of big i'm assuming ...Blue glowing orb
content.summary: Blue ball falling then disappear

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten into my car from attending a stargazing party at my community college. as i left the centennial campus down south i started heading north on i-25 towards the union exit. i had just passed motor city exit when i looked to my left north west, mind you i am on a straight stretch of road for a good quarter mile, and there were two, repeat, two white glowing orbs. they were spherical and they were very bright, brighter than any star in the sky. there were no blinking lights of say a helicopter or an airplane, or even a satellite. these orbs were vertical to one another, i mean exactly vertical. there must have been about hundred feet apart maybe more, i cant tell exactly. i had been watching them for a good ten seconds, trying to make sure that i was correct about not seeing any blinking lights, and then all of a sudden the bottom light pulsated a good 4 times with the same white glowing color it was emanating and disappeared completely, wholly, and totally. the top one remained. by this time i had just finished watching the top one that remained and as i was driving around the curving highway i lost sight of the object. i looked back in the same direction once it was safe to look again and it was gone. it is kinda of crazy because earlier i had viewed mars and jupiter as well as the moon and many star clusters/constellations, and galaxies through many different large telescopes. me and this other kid in my class had seen the same object fly pass over us in the sky while we were in the middle of the field gazing. it was an asteroid maybe, but then after the star gazing i asked the guy if he'd ever seen any ufos and he said yes, and then we started talking about interdimensional beings. now i have had many sightings in my life and there is a certain feeling that takes over when you see one of these beings or ships or w/e, but it's like they wanted you to look, and somehow they picked you and you know it's them and they know that you know it's them.  so anyhow, after i chatted with the kid i got in the car and headed out to the highway, where i then saw these two bright white lights.
content.summary: 2 white orbs in the nw sky near rocky mountains

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the porch of my home when i started to notice objects hovering up from the horizon.  after like 2 or 3 i was definitely convinced that they were ufo's because they were all the same color and size as if they were leaving from somewhere and going back to where ever that was.  it was intense.
content.summary: It wasn't just one.  there were multiple orb like objects coming from the horizon slowly for like an hour or two.  i lost count but there were a lot.

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling into my drive way, i had never seen anything like it before and have been around aircraft all my life.When i first noticed it i thought it was a star but then i quckly noticed it was moving very fast moving from northeast toward the west it then stoped dead and hovered for about 5 min. it was kind of domed shaped on top but flat on the bottom there was no soun and the color it seemed to be glowing it was bluish green very bright in color. after the sighting sighting i almost couldnt believe what i had seen, told my family what i had seen right after the sighting i was vey excited. it went back toward the north east very fast it was out of my sight within a half of a second if i would have blinked i would have missed its leaving
content.summary: I watched a bright grenish blue object flying fron the northeast moving west i then witnessed it hovering maybe a mile and a half from me after watching it for about 5 min it left the area backnortheast if i would have blinked i would have missed it.

content.detailedDescription: While standing out side of my work place with a co worker, we noticed a white light cross the sky from the above the csx building disappearing behind a cloud just past the 550 building. there was no noise, no flashing lights (like the nav lights on an aircraft)
content.summary: While standing outside with co worker we seen a light cross the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Aprox 9:15pm 4/6/14 was watching a very bright red light with a sort of orange or yellow glow around it,almost, sort of looked like a flame. very strange and hard to explain. light or glow much brighter then say aircraft landing lights. was moving slower then a plane and i thought maybe a helicopter but it wasn't. as it got closer i took a quick photo (via my phone). was getting ready to take another when it started to get a diffused look as if going through a cloud. only problem was there were no clouds. at this point while watching, the light or glow went out but with the help of the moon in the same general area i could see the darkened object for a few seconds. was not round, but appeared to be maybe four or five sides but not sure, hard to make out.
don't know what is was but can tell you what it wasn't.  not a plane (that i've ever seen), not a balloon, not a helicopter or meteorite. moving slow with no sound. fairly low altitude, would guess around a couple thousand ft. 
only have the one picture that i tried to sharpen but kind of a strange shot none the less right down to the red glow around it. also, when i took the picture i only saw red with orange around the outer perimeter not white so can't really explain that, nor can i explain the black looking object, couldn't see that through the bright red light. 
anyway, that's all i got, found it strange and thought i would pass it on. 

total time, aprox 6-7 minutes.
content.summary: Very bright red light, watched it approach for aprox 6-7 minutes then it went dark but for about5 seconds saw the object

content.detailedDescription:
Aprox 9:15pm 4/6/14 was watching a very bright red light with a sort of orange or yellow glow around it,almost, sort of looked like a flame. very strange and hard to explain. light or glow much brighter then say aircraft landing lights. was moving slower then a plane and i thought maybe a helicopter but it wasn't. as it got closer i took a quick photo (via my phone). was getting ready to take another when it started to get a diffused look as if going through a cloud. only problem was there were no clouds. at this point while watching, the light or glow went out but with the help of the moon in the same general area i could see the darkened object for a few seconds. was not round, but appeared to be maybe four or five sides but not sure, hard to make out.

content.summary: Very bright red light, watched it approach for aprox 6-7 minutes then it went dark but for about5 seconds saw the object

content.detailedDescription: I was in my van on the street when i saw the object, attention when it popped up and it was moving quickly i knew it was a ufo the optic was really bright and kept moving straight forward,at the time i had no different feelings.I was not able to see where the object left because i glance forward to see if there was anything else on the sky i look back and it just disappeared.
content.summary: It is awesome i get to see him all the time i have many pictures of different days

content.detailedDescription:
i live in kapa'a /kealia area on the island of kauai in hawaii. rough nite sleep tossed and turned all night. alarm woke me up at 4:00am 
turned on coffee maker and computer to read while i drink my coffee. decided to go outside to have a cigarette and i knew i was going to see something when i looked up. i saw all the stars in the night sky as normal. had a sip of coffee and drag on cigarette and looked up again knowing i was going to see something. then two stationary stars started to move gently in tandem and drift from stationary position and continued drifting slowly for a few minutes. i thought i would see a third light to form a triangle but never did.  they slowly turned from the sw night sky to a southerly direction slowly and gently drifting and slightly turning in tandem and continued to the south until drifting out of sight.
i was happy to see the lights because i knew something was there and seeing it was a kind of validation. after the event was over i felt somewhat satisfied in the sense that something was there.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two lights and inch apart moving in tandem drifting slight rotation in tandem drifting from sw to southerly direction and drifting off into space.

content.detailedDescription: At 2:am i look out my window and i seen red/blue lights at top of trees i grad my camcorder and started tapping but that's wen i jump in my car and i drive to were it was i got it all tapping it for 8-t0-15mint's.This is not the first time i seen it.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I"am right under it'' tapping it have all on tape.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were at westward beach. we walked up to point dume and i took some pictures. the panoramas were taken at 1:41 and 1:42. i didn't notice the object until a few weeks ago. it was twitter's anniversary and i was looking back at the pictures i took.
content.summary: I did not see this. it was just in the pictures i took.

content.detailedDescription:
On april 8th, 2014 at approx. 8:15 pm, i noticed a pulsating star that was rapidly changing colors and moving short distances abruptly. i had seen this same type of ufo, in the same location, on march 5th, 26th, and 31st. i filed sighting reports at those times with mufon, and included video footage taken during the last two. 

this evening i also took video footage that i am submitting with this report. this ufo is identical to the shape, colors, and movement of the previous 3 sightings. only this time i observed the object travel a short distance horizontally, before repeating it's rapid change in direction.

a neighbor was out walking his dog and i pointed out the ufo to him. he witnessed all of he mentioned characteristics of the object without the magnification of my cell phone. 

i later went back out to see if the ufo was still present at approx. 10:30 pm and it was, exhibiting the same characteristics previously observed and recorded on video. it is unknown how the long the object was present.
content.summary: Rapidly moving saturn type orb, changing colors, and abruptly changing direction.

content.detailedDescription: At appx 2100  my wife and i were standing in our back yard and saw what looked like a fireball in the sky. we see planes and helicopters out here all the time and this was neither. we first noticed it nw of our location and traveled towards the se before it disappeared from sight. we witnessed it for appx two minutes before it was gone. it had a yellow to light orange glow to it. we've never seen anything like it. i didn't have my phone or anything to capture a photo of it. it seemed to fade away the further it got from us.
content.summary: Looked like a fireball traveling across the sky..

content.detailedDescription: Was looking ne of my property in sw mo . i observed an amber light appear about 2000ft to 3000ft hover and descend rapidly behind the treeline it was at least 3 miles away .....I thought it was an aircraft but their were no nav lights nor engine noise and all my nieghbors dogs were going off ....The descent was to rapid for a conventional aircraft ......End
content.summary: Rapid decent of amber light

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my back yard on a nice clear evening at 7:00pm when i saw something i've never seen before, i.E. a strange shaped craft moving very fast, fairly high, silently, leaving no vapor trail.  at first i was just curious because it was moving out of the normal flight paths for this area, i.E in a direction towards the open waters of the gulf of mexico.  nothing ever goes that way. it passed directly overhead, and the bottom of the craft was colored sort of a dull blue-grey and the bottom shape was kind of like a short fat hourglass shape made by putting two delta wings together at the apex of each.  (sorry for the lack of a better description) as i watched it move away, i saw the outline of the backside of the craft, and it was an oval shape on the bottom part with a more rounded protrusion on top like some sort of a fusalage.  i calculated its speed at circa mach ii, but there was no sonic boom or noise of any sort that was apparent.  i've never seen a ufo before, but i finally reasoned that this had to have been one.  nothing dramatic happened, it just continued on a straight line until it could not be seen. i had no camera or phone at the time so i couldn't take a picture, and i'm certainly not artisticly inclined but i made a rough (very) sketch of it.
content.summary: Craft moving very fast (mach ii) south in a straight line toward the open waters of the gulf of mexico.
